name: react-native-nitro-dgram
description: ðŸš€ Ultra-high-performance Node.js dgram (UDP) implementation for React Native. Powered by Nitro Modules and a robust Rust core for maximum efficiency and low latency.
author: iwater <iwater@gmail.com>

scripts.copy-clib: npm run copy-clib-android && npm run copy-clib-ios && npm run copy-clib-mac
scripts.copy-clib-android: mkdir -p android/libs/arm64-v8a android/libs/armeabi-v7a android/libs/x86 android/libs/x86_64 && cp ../rust_c_udp/target/aarch64-linux-android/release/librust_c_udp.so android/libs/arm64-v8a/ && cp ../rust_c_udp/target/armv7-linux-androideabi/release/librust_c_udp.so android/libs/armeabi-v7a/ && cp ../rust_c_udp/target/i686-linux-android/release/librust_c_udp.so android/libs/x86/ && cp ../rust_c_udp/target/x86_64-linux-android/release/librust_c_udp.so android/libs/x86_64/ && cp ../rust_c_udp/include/UdpBindings.hpp cpp/
scripts.copy-clib-mac: mkdir -p mac && cp ../rust_c_udp/target/release/librust_c_udp.a mac/ && cp ../rust_c_udp/include/UdpBindings.hpp cpp/
